excerpt: A delicious and creamy vegan take on the traditional mac and cheese!
instructions: Cook the macaroni according to package directions.
Drain the macaroni and set aside.
Put the cashews, water, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, onion powder, turmeric, salt, and black pepper in a blender or food processor and blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the cashew sauce over the macaroni and stir until well combined.
